# locale

**Instance Property**

The locale to use when formatting the date and time components.

## Declaration

```swift
var locale: Locale
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale/autoupdatingCurrent]. If you set this property to `nil`, the formatter resets to using `autoupdatingCurrent.`

## Modifying a Date Format Style

- **timeZone**: The time zone to use when formatting the date and time components.
- **calendar**: The calendar to use when formatting the date.
- **capitalizationContext**: The capitalization context to use when formatting the date.
